“Curved wind"

As artist Agnes Martin once said, “Nature is like a harmony of music, always changing, always different, yet always perfect.” This quote perfectly encapsulates the essence of “Curved Wind,” an art project that seeks to capture this dynamic interplay between nature and humans. In this project, the wind patterns and natural elements around the performers play an integral role in the creation of a dynamic sonic synthesis. By harnessing the power of the wind and channeling it through the strings the performers were able to create a unique soundscape that responded to the natural elements around them.
